tool_description: Assigns roles to users in target systems with validation and conflict resolution.

user_identifier.description: User to assign the role to

effective_date.description: When the role assignment becomes effective

force_assignment.description: Override conflict warnings and assign anyway

notify_user.description: Send notification to user about role assignment

error_messages: User not found: The specified user identifier does not exist in the target system.
Invalid role: Role ID is not valid or not available in the target system.
Assignment conflict: Role conflicts with existing user permissions unless force_assignment is true.
Permission denied: Insufficient privileges to assign this role.
Invalid date format: Dates must be in ISO 8601 format.
Date logic error: Effective date must be before expiration date.
System unavailable: Target system is not accessible for role assignment.
Approval pending: Assignment requires approval before completion.
usage: Provide user_identifier, role_id, system_name, and assignment_reason. Optionally set effective_date, expiration_date, and control flags for approval, force assignment, and notifications.

assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for the role assignment

effective_permissions.description: Actual permissions granted through this assignment

conflicts_resolved.description: Any conflicts that were automatically resolved

approval_id.description: Approval workflow ID if approval is required
